Regional Officers have been advised that the road stretches under their jurisdiction are maintained in traffic worthy condition; 2_ There is spate of complaints from the public a8 well as from the Hon'ble Members of Parliament   regarding maintenance   of the road stretches entrusted to NHAI. 3 Complaints received regarding maintenance shall be considered on priority and following actions shall be taken: Immediately on receipt of the complaint, the Technical Divisions shall forward it via email to the Regional Officer/Project Director and IEIConsultant. A copy of the communication shall also be endorsed to the complainant via email: The complainant will also be informed that the response of the ConcessionairelIE will be put on the website. The details of the website will be intimated to him_ ii) In case the stretch pertains to BOT project, the IE shall send compliancel comments on the complaint to the RO/PD via email within period of 7 Communication regarding compliancelcomments of the IE shall also be put up on project website already created for each project. iii) RO shall ensure that the road stretch mentioned in the complaint is maintained. In case the complaint is & VIP reference, RO shall gend compliancelcomments on the complaint via email to the Headquarter within a period of 10 from the receipt of the complaint. In case of other complaints, RO shall send reply directly to the complainant with a copy to this office. iv) In case of VIP references complaint, the Technical Division shall reply to the complaint immediately on receipt of comments from the RO. 45 All Technical Divisions shall ensure strict compliance of the above_ (VK.Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord ) To 1 All Regional Officers/Project Directors 2.
